black_cards.text: Can't you see? The Jews are behind everything-the banks, the media, even ______!
What's so important right now that you can't call your mother?
Coming to Broadway next season: "______ on the Roof."
According to Freud, all children progress through three stages of development: the oral stage, the anal stage, and the ______ stage.
Oh, your daughter should meet my son! He gives to charity, he loves ______ and did I mention he's a doctor?

title: 2015 Holiday Pack
description: Official holiday pack for 2015. AKA Eight Sensible Gifts for Hanukkah / Jew Pack.
